message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn!
You said fair split, but I think I deserve more
You said I deserved more, but I think I'm being generous here, Bob!
I think I'm getting the better end of this deal, Alice!
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I need a better deal!
You're not getting any younger either, Alice. Time to make a serious offer
I'm not giving up yet, Bob. This is my last offer for now!
You're not serious about giving up, I'm not serious about being nice
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
You're not serious about this being your final offer. I'm not falling for it
This is my last, last offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
It's now or never, Alice. Take it or leave it
